mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_attach (board_type_seq, board_seq, org_file_nm, save_path, chng_file_nm, file_size, file_type, access_uri, reg_dtm) VALUES (#{boardTypeSeq}, #{boardSeq}, #{orgFileNm}, #{savePath}, #{chngFileNm}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{accessUri}, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s'))
mapper.select: SELECT attach_seq, board_seq, board_type_seq, org_file_nm, save_path, chng_file_nm, file_size, file_type, access_uri, reg_dtm FROM board_attach WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq} AND board_type_seq = #{boardTypeSeq}
